profile:
Aqua Tech Waterproofing  is the most experienced and affordable privately owned company that offers basement  waterproofing,underpinning, basement lowering,concrete floors and drain services to families and businesses across the Greater Toronto Area. Based out of Toronto and operating over 20  trucks across GTA, we are conveniently located to service you in Oakville, Richmond Hill, Metro Toronto or Ajax. 

With more than 25 years of experience our trained technicians offer a quality, reliable and stress free waterproofing service. You can count on it. In addition, our friendly and professional staff is here to answer any questions you may have about our company or our services. 

Have an emergency? Don’t hesitate. Our 24 hour Emergency phone line is here to serve you better.

Clogged drains? Leaking taps? Clogged toilet? Repairs? and more? We have what you need at highly competitive prices you can afford. We will either match or even beat other estimates. At Aqua Tech Waterproofing and Drain, our goal is about doing the job right the first time around.

We use the most sophisticated technology combined with high knowledge of our services, which means the problem is fixed fast by a systems qualified plumber, leaving you worry free.

We look forward to hearing from you.
service_area: We cover all of the GTA and most surrounding areas: Toronto, Mississauga, Oakville, Brampton, Etobicoke, Burlington, Scarborough, Maple, Woodbridge, King city, Milton, Ajax, etc. If your city/town is not mentioned please feel free to call us to check if we cover your area

profile:
Award Plus Plumbing plumbers work very hard to bring exceptional customer service that guarantees your satisfaction - it’s our number one priority. You can depend on our professional plumbing technicians that will provide you with a right solution to solve any problems. We are dedicated to your satisfaction and get the job done right. Your safety comes first - we care about your safety, comfort and peace of mind.
 
When there is an emergency, you don’t want to deal with an unprofessional and unpleasant person when you call for help. And the last thing that you don’t need is to wait. We assure you the person that will greet you on the phone will take care of you and ensure you get our professional plumbing technician right away. 
 
If you prefer to hire a professional plumber that can fix your problem and whose priority is respecting you and your home, then Award Plus Plumbing is the number 1 choice with over  25 years of experience.

profile:
Welcome to Canada Waterproofers, your one stop shop for all your waterproofing, plumbing and drain repair needs. Canada Waterproofers provide top-quality material and service. With over 25 years experience we know what products, methods and application works best for your unique situation.

Canada Waterproofers specialize in helping you with all your Waterproofing Drain and Plumbing needs. For 25 years servicing the local community with pride.

We believe that high quality workmanship and materials are key to get he job done right the first time. Canada Waterproofers treat our customers homes as if it was our own. From complete home waterproofing to minor repairs…we do it right!

Canada Waterproofers believes in old school values, this is very important in a business filled with dishonesty and careless workmanship.

Here at Canada Waterproofers we are proud of our work, and love to share every step of the job with our customers. Doing this they can understand and be involved on how the job being performed and applies to their unique situation. 

Canada Waterproofers can help you with any project big or small, and are always just a phone call away to answer any questions or concerns. 

We believe in personalization so when you call our company we won’t send you a sales person. We believe that this is unfair to our customers as we are not interested in just selling a job, but rather figuring out what the problem is at your home and offering the best solution.

Benefits to our customers


25 Year Transferable warranty provided
Over 25-years experience in the industry.
We are fully licensed, insured and have full WSIB coverage
Highly trained technicians that are licensed plumbers and waterproofers.
Building renovators licenses.
Underpinning experts.
We will detect any water leakage on your property, and fix it the first time!
Free non- obligation estimate is provided to all costumers. 
We use the latest technology available to make sure our services are top quality.
We only repair what is required, at very competitive prices. Saving homeowners thousands of dollars.

Integrity, Honesty and the highest quality workmanship within the industry. Canada Waterproofers is here for you. 

Canada Waterproofers will provide a free no obligation written quote before any work is performed. Once you decide to go ahead with the work rest assured one of our technicians will be constantly monitoring the onsite site activity to be sure that the work is performed to our high standards. 

Our technicians pride themselves attending to the smallest of details. Nothing is left to chance therefore ensuring your project is completed to the highest standards.

Here are just some services that we provide

Exterior waterproofing
Interior waterproofing
Sump pump installations
Sump pump battery back up systems
Backflow preventers 
Snaking
Camera inspections
Plumbing
And more...

The Team at Canada Waterproofers will only be content when our customers are happy. It’s important our company constantly keeps up our high quality in workmanship and materials to be sure that our customers are completely satisfied now and in the future.

The climate is changing and the challenge of keeping our aging homes becomes more of an issue. Canada Waterproofers are up for the task. Your basement will stay dry and your plumbing will perform properly for years to come. Choose Canada Waterproofers.
www.canadawaterproofers.com/basementwaterproofing

profile:
DrainWorks Plumbing is a customer-first, Toronto-based plumbing company providing full plumbing services, drain cleaning, drain repair and drain replacement. All our plumbers are 100% licensed, insured and commission-free! We take great pride in being one of the most reviewed companies on HomeStars in North America! We are also proud to say that we have been chosen (twice) as the "best plumber in the city" by Toronto Life magazine, as evidenced by their "Busy person's survival guide" issue. High praise from a wonderful and trusted publication! 

We employ full-time salaried plumbers rather than commission-based plumbers that are motivated to up-sell you. All of the DrainWorks plumbers in Toronto and surrounding areas are fully licensed, insured, and professionally trained. We are also proud to say that 100% of our employees have been with us for 10 years or more. Finally, an experienced local plumber near you that you can trust and rely on!
 
Further, we've recently had the honor of being one of a select few companies across all trades, hand picked by Gemini award winning TV host and contractor, Bryan Baeumler, of HGTV's Leave it to Bryan and Disaster DIY to be Baeumler Approved. A high mark of quality, indeed. 
 
You can count on DrainWorks for all your plumbing and drain-related needs in Toronto. Our plumbers are ready for your call with clear and upfront pricing and will always arrive on-time and fully prepared with everything they can foreseeably need.

DrainWorks Plumbing also likes to help and support our local Toronto community and charities, such as for the Easter Seals and SickKids Foundation.
Please take a few moments to read these plumbing reviews from our customers, so you too can learn about and take advantage of the ‘DrainWorks Difference’. We hope you choose us for your next call to the plumber!

**COVID-19 UPDATE - DrainWorks Plumbing is open and in full operation adhering to all Covid-19 protocols in place to offer the help you need when you need it most keeping everyone safe.**

profile:
At Tornado Plumbing we work hard to fulfill all your plumbing needs, and offer some of the best service in the GTA. Our products are high quality, and all of our work is under warranty. By using the most recent technology we can offer you the best service to ensure your plumbing work is done efficiently and with quality. We provide free estimates, competitive rates, and city rebates are available.
Our services include waterproofing, pipe burst, plumbing repairs, backwater valve, concrete work, water service and repairs, drain camera inspections, drain snaking, and underpinning (basement lowering).
With appointments booked at your convenience, and 24 hour emergency service, you’re sure to get the job done with Tornado Plumbing.

Check us out here:
https://www.facebook.com/TornadoPlumbingCom
https://twitter.com/TornadoPlumbing
https://www.instagram.com/tornado_plumbing/

YouTube videos on various plumbing and drain services may be found in our photo gallery.
services:
Waterproofing
Our skilled crews take all the necessary steps to clean and prepare your foundation wall prior to waterproofing.
We only use materials of the highest industry standard to seal your home from leaks.
With a 25 year warranty, you are guaranteed a dry basement and piece of mind.

Drains
When you need to replace your damaged sewer lines, we meet all city standards for drain work and backwater valves.
Using the minimally invasive pipe burst method, we can have your drains running again quickly.

Water Service
Using trench-less technology we can quickly replace your lead waterline or
upgrade your current water service, causing minimal damage to your property

Plumbing
We can take care of all your plumbing needs no matter the size.
Fixing small leaks to full plumbing line replacement, and everything in between.

Concrete work
From walkways to patio slabs we’ve got all your concrete needs covered.

Underpinning & Walkouts
If you’re looking for more living space, we can lower your basement to your desired height or add a second entrance.
Using approved engineer drawings, and following building codes, we will create the basement you want.

24/7 EMERGENCY SERVICE

profile:
The ROOTERWORX was established by a team that is experienced, skilled, and are in construction for decades. 

The head office of the ROOTERWORX is located in Mississauga and covers Toronto and GTA.
There are two divisions in our company for residential services: drain repair, catch basin cleaning, waterproofing, foundation & structural repair, concrete repair, concrete & foundation crack repair. 

And commercial services and multi-residential (apartment buildings, condominiums, commercial facilities): kitchen drain stack cleaning, negative side waterproofing, elevator shaft waterproofing, expansion joint waterproofing, ledge beam repair, concrete balcony repair, underground garage structural repair, underground garage waterproofing, underground garage concrete repair.

We know how to make quality; we learned the most efficient practices and use the best products on the market approved by building official associates. 
We have learned a lot through those years, and now we deliver the best to our customers.

Also, ROOTERWORX is open 24/7 for drain cleaning and drain repair services! 

416-400-2685

profile: Aquamaster Group has two divisions to serve you better: Concrete Division that specializes on all types of concrete work like : foundations, underpinnings, additions, concrete walkways, driveways, pads e.c. and Plumbing Division, providing plumbing and drain services, drain cleaning and repair and all associated works as well as waterproofing.  Having two locations, one in Toronto another one in Mississauga gives us possibility to cover sufficient service area and provide you with same day service. We are fully licensed and insured. We guarantee fast and cost efficient solutions and excellent quality services. Knowledge and experience of our workers extends to every area of plumbing, drain, underpinning and waterproofing. We offer emergency plumbing services 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. At Aquamaster we guarantee excellent quality services, individual approach and the most affordable prices in Toronto and GTA. For more than 10 years we have been earning trust from our clients, building superior reputation and becoming most trusted waterproofing company in Toronto and GTA.

profile: ROOTER-MAN Plumbing And Drain Service and Basement Syatems is a group of professionals with over 40 years of experience in the industry. Our mission is to provide high quality professional advice and solutions to home-owners. We pride ourselves in providing to our customers the highest standards in customer care throughout the process. We will provide exceptional "beyond the call of duty" services to all our customers. We are committed to providing the highest level of professionalism, service, response and quality workmanship. We take pride in our ability to diagnose, give options and complete the job with 100 percent customer satisfaction every time. If you require emergency plumbing services in the Toronto and GTA regions, there are 24 hour emergency plumbers in Mississauga, Vaughan, Oakville, Etobicoke and Burlington locations on stand-by ready to service you. From Plumbing, Basement Lowering and Underpinning to new basement Floor Upgrades and Drain issues to Wet Basement Waterproofing, Rooter-Man can handle and specializes in these services and more!

profile:
We are open to serve you during the COVID-19. Fully prepared, COVID-19 ready and committed to serve you while your health and safety remain our top priority. 

****

We are reputable plumbing, waterproofing and underpinning company that offers top services and affordable prices that help you save money and guarantee quality results. We guarantee you Peace of Mind. 

We are family based business that works on independent basis therefore we are able to compete in prices and offer our customers non-beatable quotes. No high prices, no aggressive sales, no commission based contractors, and no pressure – it is our policy. 

Our company is an expert in all areas of plumbing (residential, high-end commercial & industrial), waterproofing (exterior & interior waterproofing), all foundation repairs, drain repairs, underpinning and basement lowering. Our wide range of services includes thorough diagnostics, camera inspections & no dig technologies – air lining pipe bursting, which save your landscape and provide clean results. If you require free estimate simply give us a call and our licensed technician will discuss your needs, work within your budget and offer an effective solution. Our job speaks for itself. Once you call us you will be worries free. Call today 647-408-3262 or 647-297-6947
We run our business with integrity and treat our customers with respect. 

We GUARANTEE YOU PEACE OF MIND at a fraction of the cost.
service_area: Proudly serving:  Toronto, Richmond Hill, The Beaches, Riverdale, East York, The Annex, Etobicoke, North York, Scarborough, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Burlington, Markham, Thornhill, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Brampton, Kitchener, Waterloo, Guelph, Cambridge, Milton, St. Catharines, Oshawa, Barrie, Newmarket, and Pickering.
products: We are the EXCLUSIVE carrier and the ONLY distributor of the top of the line newest technology moisture meters (designed and manufactured in Europe) - deep probing, non destructive and accurate; which we use to detect and to measure the amount of moisture in concrete and other building materials. When you are purchasing a house or you are concerned about dampness and moisture in the walls (especially basement), contact us to inspect the walls with one of our meters! 100% Accurate! No faulty results! This will save your money!
services: Umbrella Waterproofing, Plumbing & Drains offers: All plumbing repairs and installations; Exterior Waterproofing; Interior Waterproofing; Full Drain Services; Underpinning; Basement floor lowering; Concrete floor installation; Emergency Services: drain cleaning, building drain replacement, water pipe burst repairs, video inspection of drains & snake cleaning; High Pressure Water Jetting; Sum pump installation; Back flow prevention; Backwater valve installation; Sewer Ejector installation; Trench-less Technology; Weeping tile systems; 4 layer waterproofing technology; Underground waterline upgrade; No digging technologies (air lining pipe bursting) - save your landscape!
specialities: We offer the newest technologies and use powerful machinery: Power Flushing; Trench-less technology; Moisture measurement in walls (most building materials); No digging technologies
project_rate: We provide you with free estimates and prices upfront before we start.
